author: crossley
msg: Improve the explanation of the messages issued by Cocoon.

author: pquerna
msg: *  build/jlibtool.c: Start the string with null, and strcat will extend it correctly.  This fixes jlibtool on FreeBSD 6.0-CURRENT. (and likely other platforms...)

author: pquerna
msg: * configure.in: Fix the test for ancient FreeBSD that fails on a 6.0-CURRENT Machine.  Use the kern.osreldate sysctl which gives us a stable versioning method.  We already use it for the FreeBSD version detection in the build hints code.

author: jberry
msg: Replace $Log$ keyword and logs with $Id$ in remainder of files, I hope.
Regex is my friend, I hope.
